title: Report Flickering Lights
description: A customer reports that the lights in their entire house have been flickering for the past hour.

tasks.description: Identify the customer's account and service location.
Check the OMS and SCADA systems for any voltage fluctuations or alerts on the local circuit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds no widespread outage but sees minor voltage alarms on the feeder.

tasks.description: Create a non-emergency service order for a crew to investigate the issue, possibly caused by a loose neutral or vegetation on the line.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a trouble ticket with all relevant details for a field crew.
